Appendix 3

Phenotypic character data matrix. Polymorphism are marked by letters as follows: a = [0 1], b = [1 2], c = [0 1 2]. Dashes indicate inaaplicable states, question marks indicate unknown states.



Osmundastrum cinnamomeum	-?100000010000000--010001000-00-102010000000000-000113200-00001--------001001
